map.string: {"notification_sections":[{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I receive kudos on my activities or likes on my comments","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"kudos","title":"Kudos and Likes"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone comments on my activity","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"comment","title":"Comments"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone comments on an activity I commented on","enabled":false,"host":"strava","name":"other_activity_comments","title":"Comments on Others’ Activities"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone mentions me in an activity","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"mentioned","title":"Mentions on Activities"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I lose the top place on a leaderboard","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"lost_kom","title":"Lost CR"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when an activity from my device syncs to Strava","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"activities","title":"Device Activity Synced"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I’m sharing my location with safety contacts","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"beacon","title":"Beacon"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone sends me their activity so I can save it to my profile","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"activity_invite","title":"Add to Activities"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me to remind me to upload","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"first_upload","title":"Upload Reminders"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me with analysis of segment efforts on my recent activities","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"segment_analysis","title":"Segment Analysis"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when my activity crop finishes","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"activity_crop","title":"Activity Crop"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when my elevation adjustment finishes","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"elevation_correction","title":"Activity Elevation Adjustment"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I reach an activity milestone or complete a goal","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"progress_completion","title":"Progress Completion"}],"title":"Activities"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone I know joins Strava","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"friend_joined","title":"Friend Joins"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone follows me on Strava","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"follower","title":"New Follower"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when my friends post interesting activities, and when friends I\u0027ve favorited post activities","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"kudo_your_friend","title":"Friends\u0027 Activities"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me to suggest friends to follow","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"people_you_may_know","title":"Suggested Friend"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone shares a segment or route with me on Strava.","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"segment_invite","title":"Segments and Routes"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone I\u0027m following has uploaded a video","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"video_upload","title":"Videos"}],"title":"Friends"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I\u0027ve joined, made progress on or completed either a Strava Challenge or Group Challenge","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"challenges","title":"Challenge Progress"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I complete a challenge that has a reward, donation, or an opportunity to learn more","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"challenge_rewards","title":"Challenge Rewards"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone invites me to either a Strava Challenge or Group Challenge","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"challenge_invite","title":"Challenge Invites"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone comments on a Group Challenge","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"small_group_competition_comments","title":"Group Challenge Comments"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone passes me on a Group Challenge leaderboard","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"small_group_competition_overtaken","title":"Group Challenge Leaderboard Changes"}],"title":"Challenges"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when a friend invites me to join a club","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"club_invite","title":"Club Invitation"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when a post is added in one of my clubs","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"club_posts","title":"New Post"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when an event is added in one of my clubs","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"group_event_announce","title":"New Club Event"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone requests to join one of my clubs","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"club_join_request","title":"Join Request"}],"title":"Clubs"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when a friend invites me to join an event","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"group_event_invite","title":"Event Invitation"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me 24 hours before one of my events","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"group_event_reminder","title":"Event Reminder"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when one of my events is changed or canceled","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"group_event_change","title":"Event Change"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone RSVPs to an event I\u0027m organizing","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"group_event_rsvp","title":"Event RSVP"}],"title":"Events"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I receive kudos on a post or likes on my comments","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"post_kudos","title":"Post Kudos and Likes"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone comments on my post or replies to my comment on a post","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"club_comments","title":"Post Comments"},{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when someone mentions me in a post comment","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"post_comment_mentioned","title":"Mentions on Posts"}],"title":"Posts"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Notify me when I upload a file that includes health data that I haven\u0027t given Strava consent to process","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"health_data","title":"Health Data"}],"title":"Data Permissions"},{"classes":[{"default":false,"description":"Allow Strava to send me push notifications about promotions or other marketing announcements.","enabled":false,"host":"strava","name":"marketing","title":"Marketing"},{"default":false,"description":"Receive announcements about new features and tips for how to best use them.","enabled":true,"host":"strava","name":"feature_tips","title":"Feature and Subscription Tips"}],"title":"Other"}]}
